title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2024 (Commencement) 

(No. 3) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic act 2024 (commencement) (no 3) order 2024

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 2. The 9th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 20
text_raw:
2. The 9th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 20 

of the Road Traffic Act 2024 (No. 10 of 2024) comes into effect. 

GIVEN under my hand, 

8 August, 2024. 

JAMES LAWLESS, 

Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [398] 3
